name: Choking Hazard
description:
Choking Hazard is a game developed during the GMTK 2020 GameJam, it takes place in the distant future of 2009, where mechanized production has gone out of control. You've been hired by our robot overlords to eat everything that doesn't get sold. Can you do it?! 

Credits:
This was a one man Dev Team, however I used music from the wonderful Abstraction, from their 3 red heart album with permission. A couple sound effects were provided by Freesound.org. And the rest were by my brilliant sibling!

Everything else was made by me Agapios (Pip) Kokkos. 

Special Thanks to:
Brackeys for their online tutorials
My friend Ross for providing some play testing
The fantastic Poky for being an amazing and supportive bf <3
(Also, for Catching a Bug that would have ruined my submission otherwise)
Marxy 37 for some feedback.

And of course, you :)
